title: I Saw Things Falling Apart _ Doujin Artwork for SCP-804
content:

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]

**HelloÔºÅ**

**This is HideyamaÔºÅ**

A month after the release of the [[[SCP-2999]]]artwork, I also drew one for the [[[SCP-804]]].

And here is the URL to my first artwork page
https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:hideyama-gakiyo/comments/show
 
Hope U enjoy itÔºÅ

If U have any suggestions, __feel free to share them in the Discussion pls!__
